reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater fits perfectly, being a little oversized and not too baggy, while also praising its quality and comfort, noting it's not itchy or scratchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater!
items.body: Really soft and cozy sweater. Fits as listed, washes nicely, warm and not too heavy. A great buy! Read more
items.author: Deanna Frederiksen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable! Fit is great! Looks fantastic with a blazer!
items.body: I love the feel of the yarn this sweater is made of and the little accent color on sleeves, neck and bottom. I bought the cream colored with brown trim and wear it with a corduroy brown blazer and it looks great together. I've also worn it around the house watching a football game and loved the softness and warmth. Great sweater! Might look into getting another one in a different color combination! Haven't washed it yet, but I don't think there will be a problem. Read more
items.author: Melanie C. Schaafsma

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Appears to be good quality, great fit and color, and comfortable.
items.body: Daughter got it oversized, so not sure if it is true to size. She normally wears smalls, but tends to buy sweaters in medium or large. Cream color is just as seen in image. Quality is good. Very nice! It is a good length and looks great with skirts, leggings, and jeans. Read more
items.author: Dina Whelan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute sweater!
items.body: Super cute thick sweater! I ordered a small and it is a little bit oversized just like I wanted. Probably will order more. Perfect to throw on for a fall day, or you can always layer underneath for more warmth. Quality is nice and a little weighted. Read more
items.author: Reese Goldman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy sweater
items.body: This has become one of my favorite sweaters. It is oversized but doesn’t look sloppy. The coloring was great. It is warm and cozy to wear. Read more
items.author: RenW

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Summer weight sweater
items.body: This did not meet my expectation. The weave is very loose and the sweater is not thick and cozy. By the end of the first day of wearing this, I had 3 snags. It's cute, but it is not the cozy sweater I was looking for. Read more
items.author: Wayne Sundberg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Medium thickness soft medium sleeve length
items.body: Not lightweight, fairly thick with average sleeve length. The beige is softer than the navy one but both have nice cable detail. The neck, waist and wrist contrast border color pops. Seem to be sewn with quality. If you like looser sweaters order one size up. Color goes throughout. Worth the price. I think they will be warm enough without shirt underneath; definitely cozy with layering. Neckline just right for collar shirt underneath if you want. No neck tags. Mainstay for wardrobe in the winter. Can wear with pants or with skirts. Haven’t washed yet, but will lay flat to dry; delicate wash cycle is what I plan to use with them. Average length not crop sweaters but not tunics; not quite as long as pic seems to elude hits at bottom of hip. Read more
items.author: Logan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Sweater — Would Buy Again
items.body: I like this sweater! It fits true to size (I am wearing the large) and has a really cute, relaxed look. The fabric is "breezy," which makes it perfect for layering—I'd recommend wearing a tank top or a thin shirt underneath if you're looking for extra warmth. It's comfortable - not itchy. I would definitely buy more in different colors. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Emmy and Pops

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Gray, Blue, Burgundy, Black, Mineral Red, Dark Green, Red, Medium Grey, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
